name: YTs
how_to_perform:
1. Start by lying on a mat with your back facing upwards, arms extended overhead and legs lifted at 90-degree angles.
2. Engage your core by drawing your belly button towards your spine, maintaining a straight line from head to heels.

3. Lower your right arm while simultaneously lifting your left leg, aiming for the ground beside you.
4. Start raising your arm and lowering your leg in sync with each other, keeping them parallel to the floor as much as possible.
5. Maintain rapid alternating movements on both arms and legs throughout the duration of the exercise.
6. Once you complete the desired number of repetitions or time duration, slowly return to the starting position and rest.
short_summary: YTs are a dynamic, upper-body and lower-body exercise that combines cardio and strength training, performed while lying down and alternating limb movements.
